Rule: Achieving higher education levels (Doctorate, Masters, Prof-school) is associated with earning more than $50k a year.
Marital status changes (Widowed, Divorced) or remaining Single with higher education can lead to a higher income.
Working in a "Blue-Collar" job with higher education or switching to "Other/Unknown" and "White-Collar" occupations can lead to a higher income.
Switching from the "Private" sector to "Government" with higher education can lead to a higher income.
The number of hours worked per week (40 hours) is consistent and does not impact the income prediction significantly.
